Interface TiledMapAPI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    TiledCollisionResolver

    public interface TiledMapAPI
extends TiledCollisionResolver
    Provides extended operations on TiledMap objects.

    • Method Detail

      • setEventFactory

        void setEventFactory(GameEventFactory eventFactory)
        Sets an optional event factory which is utilized to create game events. A game event is any event matching the criteria of the event factory.
        Parameters:
        eventFactory - a new event factory. Not defined by default.
